cleaned_text: Natural Quartz Crystal Square Cubes Crystal receives, activates, stores transmits, and amplifies energy. Stimulates activate all levels of consciousness. Brings harmony to the soul. Quantity- 9 square Crystal cubes (approx 2cm) These pieces are hand-cut and polished so they do differ slightly in size and height, the height is usually about the same as the base measurement. You will also find bubbles and ziram inside which is natural.
